title: Launching iden-T-fy â€” The Future of Identification!
imageAlt: Screenshot of the iden-T-fy app's profile page

description.__html:
Averi Studios Inc. is proud to launch its newest project: iden-T-fy!

It's an iOS, Android, and web app that replaces physical ID cards with a central, digitized ID hub on your phone.
Instead of taking a photo of your ID cards like other identification apps, iden-T-fy provides a single authentication profile that organizations can use to verify your identity.

To learn more, check out the press release or visit the official website at:

www.iden-t-fy.com
